title: Freelancing
headline: Freelancer
searchDescription: Developing websites and applications for clients
longDescription: I've been freelancing for a while now. I've worked on a few projects. I've also learned a lot about design.

title: Textify.ai
headline: Frontend Developer Intern
searchDescription: Collaborating with development team to plan, design and implement new features.
longDescription: At Textify.ai I worked in the development of a SAAS based application. I was responsible for the development of the frontend of the application. I also worked on the design of the application.

title: To The New
headline: DevOps Intern
searchDescription: Learned about DevOps and cloud technologies
longDescription: Successfully deployed a Flask-based dummy application using the automation script, demonstrating the practical application of infrastructure as code (IaC) principles. Developed automation scripts using Terraform to streamline the deployment process, enabling the deployment.

title: CarDekho
headline: Software Engineer Intern
searchDescription: Helping in development of a website for a new product
longDescription: Played a pivotal role in the development of a new product, 'CarDekho Connect', by creating a dedicated website to introduce and showcase the product.
